webEncoder

Class StoryEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • webEncoder.StoryEncoder

  • public class StoryEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Encodes the Story generated into HTML so that the browsers can show them to the users
    Author:
    nickleus
